definition: to beat the gong to open a performance
to beat the gong to clear the way/(fig.) to pave the way for sth
lit. to beat a gong; fig. to irritate sb/a provocation
to strike the edge of the gong/(fig.) to stir the pot (i.e. cause or exacerbate a dispute)
the final bell (esp. in sports competition)

pinyin: ting1 hua4 ting1 sheng1 , luo2 gu3 ting1 yin1

definition: Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

sentences.english: And this is "Da Luo", it is a big gong.
sentences.chinese: 这个叫“大锣”，是锣的一种。

sentences.english: The main part of the paper is divided into four chapters: Chapter I is the body research of EZhou-Paiziluo.
sentences.chinese: 第一章为鄂州牌子锣本体研究。

sentences.english: I am only a resounding gong or a clanging cymbal.
sentences.chinese: 却没有爱，我就成了鸣的锣，响的钹一般。

sentences.english: The construction has been started three months ahead of schedule, everyone devoted themselves to the work.
sentences.chinese: 工程提前三个月响锣，大家很快投入了紧张的工作中。

sentences.english: We must always be wary of those who with sounding brass and a tinkling cymbal preach the "ism" of appeasement.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须警惕那些敲着锣打着鼓宣传缓和主义的分子。

definition: Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
watchman's clapper/wooden clappers with bars of unequal length
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
